vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.21.19;
daughter of: Haruz (H2743); married to Manasseh (H4519H);
mother of: Amon (H0526H)
§ Meshullemeth = "friend"
daughter of Haruz of Jotbah, wife of king Manasseh of Judah, and mother of king Amon of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Harús; esposa del rey Manasés; madre de rey Amón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米舒利密 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "朋友"
約提巴人哈魯斯的女兒, 猶大王瑪拿西的妻子, 猶大王亞捫的母親
(王下 21:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米舒利密 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "朋友"
约提巴人哈鲁斯的女儿, 犹大王玛拿西的妻子, 犹大王亚扪的母亲
(王下 21:19)
